AppHealth.description: AppHealth contains aggregated health from various sources, for a given app

AppListItem.description: AppListItem has the necessary information to display the console app list

istioSidecar.description: Define if all Pods related to the Workloads of this app has an IstioSidecar deployed

ContainerInfo.description: ContainerInfo holds container name and image

DeploymentStatus.description: DeploymentStatus gives the available / total replicas in a deployment of a pod

EnvoyHealthWrapper.description: EnvoyHealthWrapper wraps EnvoyServiceHealth with the service name

EnvoyRatio.description: EnvoyRatio is the number of healthy members versus total members

EnvoyServiceHealth.description: EnvoyServiceHealth is the number of healthy versus total membership (ie. replicas) inside envoy cluster for inbound and outbound traffic

path.description: String that describes where in the yaml file is the check located

severity.description: Indicates the level of importance: error or warning

IstioConfigList.description: This type is used for returning a response of IstioConfigList
IstioConfigList.title: IstioConfigList istioConfigList

IstioValidation.title: IstioValidation represents a list of checks associated to an Istio object.

checks.description: Array of checks. It might be empty.

valid.description: Represents validity of the object: in case of warning, validity remains as true

NameIstioValidation.description: List of validations grouped by object name

NamespaceAppHealth.description: NamespaceAppHealth is an alias of map of app name x health

NamespaceValidations.description: List of validations grouped by namespace

Pod.description: Pod holds a subset of v1.Pod data that is meaningful in Kiali

Pods.description: Pods alias for list of Pod structs

Reference.description: Reference holds some information on the pod creator

RequestHealth.description: RequestHealth holds several stats about recent request errors

ServiceHealth.description: ServiceHealth contains aggregated health from various sources, for a given service

StatusInfo.description: This is used for returning a response of Kiali Status
StatusInfo.title: StatusInfo statusInfo

externalServices.description: An array of external services installed

status.description:
The state of Kiali
A hash of key,values with versions of Kiali and state

items.example: Istio version 0.7.1 is not supported, the version should be 0.8.0

TokenGenerated.description: This is used for returning the token
TokenGenerated.title: TokenGenerated tokenGenerated

expired_at.description:
The expired time for the token
A string with the Datetime when the token will be expired

token.description:
The authentication token
A string with the authentication token for the user

TypedIstioValidations.description: List of validations grouped by object type

Workload.description: Workload has the details of a workload

WorkloadHealth.description: WorkloadHealth contains aggregated health from various sources, for a given workload

WorkloadListItem.description: WorkloadListItem has the necessary information to display the console workload list

appLabel.description: Define if Pods related to this Workload has the label App

istioSidecar.description: Define if Pods related to this Workload has an IstioSidecar deployed

versionLabel.description: Define if Pods related to this Workload has the label Version

WorkloadOverview.description: Useful to display a link to the workload details page.
WorkloadOverview.title: WorkloadOverview has the summary information of a workload.

destinationRule.description: This is used for returning a DestinationRule
destinationRule.title: DestinationRule destinationRule

createdAt.description: The creation date of the destinationRule

resourceVersion.description: The resource version of the destinationRule

destinationRules.description: This is used for returning an array of DestinationRules
destinationRules.title: DestinationRules destinationRules

externalServiceInfo.description: This is used for returning a response of Kiali Status
externalServiceInfo.title: Status response model

version.description: The installed version of the service

istioRule.description: This type type is used for returning a IstioRule
istioRule.title: IstioRule istioRule

istioRules.description: This type type is used for returning an array of IstioRules
istioRules.title: IstioRules istioRules

namespace.description:
A Namespace provide a scope for names
This type is used to describe a set of objects.

virtualService.description: This type is used for returning a VirtualService
virtualService.title: VirtualService virtualService

createdAt.description: The creation date of the virtualService

resourceVersion.description: The resource version of the virtualService

virtualServices.description: This type is used for returning an array of VirtualServices
virtualServices.title: VirtualServices virtualServices

WorkloadValidations.description: Listing all istio validations for object in the namespace

appHealthResponse.description: appHealthResponse contains aggregated health from various sources, for a given app

appListResponse.description: Listing all apps in the namespace

badRequestError.description: BadRequestError: the client request is incorrect

genericError.description: A GenericError is the default error message that is generated.

internalError.description: A Internal is the error message that means something has gone wrong

istioConfigList.description: HTTP status code 200 and IstioConfigList model in data

namespaceAppHealthResponse.description: namespaceAppHealthResponse is a map of app name x health

namespaceValidationsResponse.description: Listing all istio validations for object in the namespace

notFoundError.description: A NotFoundError is the error message that is generated when server could not find what was requested.

serviceDetailsResponse.description: Listing all the information related to a workload

serviceHealthResponse.description: serviceHealthResponse contains aggregated health from various sources, for a given service

statusInfo.description: HTTP status code 200 and statusInfo model in data

tokenGenerated.description: HTTP status code 200 and tokenGenerated model in data

typeValidationsResponse.description: Listing all istio validations for object in the namespace

workloadDetails.description: Listing all the information related to a workload

workloadHealthResponse.description: workloadHealthResponse contains aggregated health from various sources, for a given workload

workloadListResponse.description: Listing all workloads in the namespace
